about.title: About me
about.description: Hello! I've been residing in Japan for seven years, during which I've had the privilege of teaching English to thousands of students. I've always emphasized the importance of extensive reading to enhance vocabulary and comprehension skills. That's precisely why I've established this websiteâ€”a gift to all my students, both past and future!
